name: Roasted Tomato and Tomatillo Salsa
description: This is a delicious Salsa to add to your repertoire!  It uses both tomatoes and tomatillos to create a completely unique flavor.  Yum!!

recipeInstructions.text: Husk the tomatillos and then rinse both the tomatoes and tomatillos.  I usually remove the stems from both of them knowing that any juices leftover in the roasting pan will go into the blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Husk the tomatillos and then rinse both the tomatoes and tomatillos.  I usually remove the stems from both of them knowing that any juices leftover in the roasting pan will go into the blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the tomatoes and tomatillos in a 400F oven for 20-25 minutes.  Here's why roasting tomatillos is better than boiling them.
recipeInstructions.name: Roast the tomatoes and tomatillos in a 400F oven for 20-25 minutes.  Here's why roasting tomatillos is better than boiling them.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the roasted tomatoes and tomatillos to a blender along with 1/3 small onion, 1 peeled garlic clove, 1 rinsed and de-stemmed jalapeno (or less for a milder version), 10-12 sprigs rinsed cilantro.  Combine well (I usually leave it a bit chunky.)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the roasted tomatoes and tomatillos to a blender along with 1/3 small onion, 1 peeled garlic clove, 1 rinsed and de-stemmed jalapeno (or less for a milder version), 10-12 sprigs rinsed cilantro.  Combine well (I usually leave it a bit chunky.)

recipeInstructions.text: Take a taste for seasoning.  I added another 1/2 jalapeno, a pinch of salt, and a generous squeeze of lime.
recipeInstructions.name: Take a taste for seasoning.  I added another 1/2 jalapeno, a pinch of salt, and a generous squeeze of lime.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately or chill in the fridge for a bit before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately or chill in the fridge for a bit before serving.

recipeInstructions.text: Store leftovers in an airtight container in the fridge where they will keep for a few days.
